article.headline: BREAKING: %country% hits wave of stability!
article.text: A new study shows that %country% is incredibly stable.

article.headline: Outbreak of plague hits %country%!
article.text: An outbreak of the plague has been blamed on immigrants being smuggled in to %country%.

article.headline: Riots in the Streets
article.text: There are riots in the streets of the capital of %country%.

article.headline: Officials warn to not go to %country% due to plague
article.text: Widespread plague makes %country% incredibly dangerous to be in.

article.headline: Chaos in the Streets!
article.text: Officials warn that %country% is incredibly unsafe.
